  physical_appearance: This is a chakla or a hanging textile. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. The chakla is decorated with stylized depictions of birds
 deities
 and figures riding a horse carriage in the center. There is a figure playing the flute on the left. The chakla is pentagonal in shape
 with a triangular top.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a chakla or a hanging textile. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. The chakla is decorated with stylized depictions of birds, deities, and figures riding a horse carriage in the center. There is a figure playing the flute on the left. The chakla is pentagonal in shape, with a triangular top.
